projects.description: A tool for Christians to start their day, First Light includes a randomly-selected verse of the day, a task manager, a note-taking zone, a prayer-list, and a built-in ESV bible. It even shows you the current weather in your area if you provide permission to access your location.
projects.tag: First Light.  Find your way for the day.

projects.description: Tomorrow Land is a simple budgeting tool the keeps everything in the middle of the screen to avoid scrolling.  It selects a random verse from a curated list to help give perspective, and it auto-sorts spending input into one of six categories.

Whitney Kelley is a professional flutist and teacher in the Denver metro area.  She's also my wife!  Her website features an interactive private lesson information section, and it automatically removes events from her performance schedule as they expire.
JavaScript-selected quotes over a JavaScript-selected background color, refreshing every 7 seconds. A project from Team Treehouse.
Population, pagination, and search of a list of students.  A project from Team Treehouse.
This form uses regular expressions to validate user input live.  It also prevents users from registering for conflicting events. A project from Team Treehouse.
A responsive phrase-hunting game with keyboard functionality.  Created with object-oriened programming in JavaScript. A project from Team Treehouse.
projects.tag: Phrase Hunter's css was provided by Team Treehouse and not designed to be mobile-responsive, so a wider-than-phone screen is advised.

projects.description: An API project with a gallery, search functionality, modals, and modal navigation. A project from Team Treehouse.
